main event: On 13 July 1949, four witnesses reported sighting three disc-shaped objects flying in formation over Pullman, Washington.
interesting points: The objects were described as being circular-shaped discs, about 10 feet in diameter., The objects were black on top and silver on the bottom., Witnesses reported no smoke, trails, exhaust, or sound from the objects., The sighting lasted approximately 5-8 minutes., Four B-29 aircraft were known to be in the area at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Civilians employed at the local railroad and seed company, with varying levels of education and eyesight.
